summary: 'Blackie' Tat looks for a new Saint of Gamblers, and finds him in the form of a dimwitted mainlander.
cast: Eric Kot|Chingmy Yau|Man-Tat Ng|Diana Pang|Ben Lam|Ashton Chen|Fui-On Shing|Donnie Yen|Pak-Cheung Chan|Andy Cheng|John Ching|Kwok-Ping Choi|Raven Choi|Edward Corbett|William Wai-Lun Duen|Wai Lun Fung|Ping Ha|Ping Han|Si Man Hui|Miu Ting Kong|Lung Kwong|Dave Ching Lam|Siu-Kei Lee|Tat Chiu Lee|Ta Lei|Fun Lo|Wai-Cheung Mak|Siu-Yin Tsang|Manfred Wong|Yung-Lin Yeung|Bobby Yip|Corey Yuen
title: Dou sing 2: Gai tau dou sing
